# ‚ö° Low Latency Screen Recorder

**Low Latency Screen Recorder** is a lightweight, high-performance screen capture tool built with modern C++. Designed for ultra-low latency and high frame rates, it uses the latest **Windows Desktop Duplication API** and **Media Foundation** to record your screen or a specific application window at up to **240 FPS**, encoding directly to **H.264 MP4** using **SinkWriter**.

## üöÄ Features

- üé• **Capture up to 240 FPS** for ultra-smooth video
- ‚úî **Target a specific application** or record the full screen
- üëÄ **Hidden recorder UI** ‚Äî won't appear in the final output
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Real-time H.264 encoding** via Media Foundation
- üíæ **MP4 output** using SinkWriter
- ü§è **Minimal dependencies**, small binary size
- üñ•Ô∏è **Optimized for Windows 10/11**
